content:
Book 30 nights & let us reward you with 5 ways to say thank you

 
• One Complimentary Night Stay Per 40 Room Nights Booked
• One Premium Upgrade with Bottle of Wine for a Guest of your Choice
• $25.00 Amazon Gift Card
• $20.00 Gift Certificate to our Seven Stills Bar/Restaurant
• $15.00 Lyft Credits
 
 BOOK BY August 31st AND ACTUALIZE BY December 31st
Based on actualized room revenue before taxes/fees.
OFFER Not Valid on EXISTING CONTRACTS, Blackout dates may apply
  B

P: 415.989.3500

E: sales@stanfordcourt.com
